file_content.text: There you are! I've never seen anything so reckless and stupid in my entire career!
And it worked! I've seen platoons fight for a month to hit the Imps that hard, and you did it on a whim!
I just did my duty, nothing more.
It was nothing.
I wouldn't call that "nothing" by a long shot.
That's just how Havoc works.
You've got to be more than "good" to mess up the Imps like that.
After that op, I was expecting a medal, not a rant.
Is this the thanks I get?
You get a medal in my book, Captain. That was some fancy fighting.
Captain! Great work out there, great work!
You made that op plan look easy. In and out, hit and run--the Imps never had a clue. Top-notch soldiering.
I'm just glad we got the Safecrackers out of there.
Thank you.
You and me both. Quesh definitely won't be making my list of the galaxy's most relaxing destinations.
I've had much tougher ops.
I'd hate to see what you think is tough.
Anyone could've pulled that op--Havoc is needed elsewhere.
This was a waste of my time.
I don't know anybody who could've sent the Imps running like you did. I've never seen anything like it.
You got me and my people out of a tight spot, and we won't forget it. Whatever and whenever you need, the Safecrackers are there.
Just keep fighting the Imps with everything you've got, Lieutenant.
No need for that.
That won't be a problem, sir.
I'll be glad to have your help, Lieutenant. General Garza already has plans for you.
Much appreciated.
That's what I hear. It'll be a pleasure to work with you again.
Keep your men sharp and ready for action, Lieutenant. You'll be called on very soon.
I expect no less.
Understood. We'll stay limber.
All right, all right--we're not on vacation here, people. Coria, get your men settled and ready for transport.
Captain, it's been a pleasure. Contact General Garza with the rundown before you take off. Dismissed.
Move out, soldier!
We've dug in, Major, but the Imps are coming on strong, and I never much cared for playing defense.
Just hang in there, son. Havoc Squad just walked in--I'll get them briefed and in the field on the double!
Just keep your heads down and your guns firing, son. Havoc Squad's CO is here now--we'll have you out of there in no time!
Copy that. I'm sure we'll find a way to keep busy. Coria out.
What's the situation, Major?
Reporting for duty.
The situation is a mess, that's what it is!
Just how bad off are we, Major?
Sounds rough out there.
Things are grim, no doubt about it. If you hadn't turned up,..
Give me a rundown so I can get moving, Major.
Let's make this fast.
Wrong attitude, Captain. If it takes a hundred years, we're getting those boys out of there.
Everything went south while the Safecrackers were on a bunker raid. Intel was bad, alarms got tripped, and the Imps moved out in force.
Now Coria's people are surrounded, outnumbered and outgunned. We don't punch 'em a hole to run through, every man in that outfit is a goner.
I don't care how many Imps there are. We're getting our people out of there.
I won't let that happen.
Let's get out there and bust some heads. What's the plan, Major?
Agreed, Captain. Leaving our comrades to the Empire is never an option.
The Republic does not leave its heroes to suffer and die. Havoc Squad will do whatever it takes!
I'm not big on rushing headfirst into enemy lines. Any other options?
No goal is unreachable, no feat unachievable. For every destination, there is a path.
I'm all for rescuing our people, but we need a strategy.
Do you have a plan?
Agreed. We don't have the manpower to fight through the Imps head-on. We need to outmaneuver them.
If the Imps outnumber a full platoon, they outnumber Havoc even more.
What do you expect me to do?
I know how to do my job. I'm not going to throw you at the Imp lines and expect a miracle.
Diversion is the key. Scouts found an Imperial command center, deep behind their lines. That's where you'll strike.
Equipment, vehicles, personnel--anything with an Imperial logo gets holes in it. The Imps will rush back to stop you, and the Safecrackers will get the gap they need.
Just give me the coordinates, and I'll make some noise, Major.
I'll make it happen.
Let's give those scumbags a run for their money!
What about air strikes or artillery? Couldn't we clear a path that way?
There are other options.
No-go on both. We'd have to drop more ordnance than we're likely to see in a year's worth of requisitions.
As soon as the Imps clear out, Coria will contact you so that you can all burn jets back here.
This plan just gets us pinned down instead of the Safecrackers. Who's going to get us out?
My team would be trapped.
It sounds like I'll just be trading places with Lieutenant Coria.
I'd be trapped.
You can move a lot faster than the Safecrackers can. Coria will contact you as soon as the Imps pull out--you'll be long gone before they can close in.
Speeders are waiting for you. Get out there and give the Imps something to think about!
We've got a speeder prepped and waiting. Get out there and make a mess, soldier!
